sys_hub_flow_snapshot.name: LINK_EvaluateDeviceMACs

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: First check whether a valid MAC exists in the computer table itself. If it does, try to find it--if an Armis record exists, handle it and end.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Next check all of the network adapters associated with the computer. If any of them match an Armis record, handle and end.
